item.title: Banking Rally Lifts Indian Markets: RBI Policy Boosts Nifty To 24,800, Sensex Ends Near 81,000
item.description: Benchmarks staged a strong comeback on RBI’s supportive policy measures, though retail sentiment on Nifty 50 remained ‘bearish’ on Stocktwits.

item.title: Persistent Shares Slip Below ₹5,000: Technicals Suggest Near-Term Weakness
item.description: CLSA maintained the stock among its top IT picks, citing steady demand and stable margins.

item.title: Why Tesla’s Chinese Rival Nio’s Stock Is Accelerating Premarket Today?
item.description: Shanghai, China-based Nio reported deliveries of 34,749 in September, representing a 64% increase from the same month last year.

item.title: Netflix Stock On Retail's Radar As Executive's Charlie Kirk Remarks Spark Backlash, Musk Joins Cancellation Wave

item.title: Why Ryvyl Stock Is Jumping 100% Premarket Today
item.description: The company announced a merger with RTB Digital, a Web3 media technology firm that has partnered with Yahoo, TheStreet, and Paris Saint-Germain.
